message: Hi Bob, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject and we go to the next round, your money will be worth 5% less due to inflation, while mine won't decrease in value. Accepting now maximizes our combined utility.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns about inflation. I propose a 38-62 split in your favor. This way, you still get a larger share while recognizing my need to offset the value loss due to inflation. Let's work together to maximize our outcomes.
